I've been having quite a few conversations with a friend that has life changing money in crypto currently.

He's been in this position before, but lost/rode it all down last cycle.   

Here are some thoughts from those conversations:

I don't know how long this bull market lasts.
"We believe Fluid DEX v2 will become the biggest DEX by volume this year across all chains combined."

Huma is a pretty good addition to Solana and seems to be doing quite well.

Non speculative yield of 10.5% + points. Pools are full now. I have some USDC in there. 

Pretty low risk imo as Huma is financing the settlement of payments, which are very short term.

This is really impressive. 
@KaminoFinance
 has continued to grow in SOL deposits and borrows during this insanely volatile and turbulent period. 

I would have expected a bit of a contraction, but the data says otherwise. 

Users trust Kamino.
